dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hahahahaha! No, no, I am, like, absolutely losing it right now. What did I just, uh, read?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hahahahaha! No, no, I am, like, absolutely losing it right now. What did I just, uh, read?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I know, it's, um, it's a lot to take in, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I know, it's, um, it's a lot to take in, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Joe Biden is, like, a sentient golden retriever? And he, like, won an interdimensional election?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Joe Biden is, like, a sentient golden retriever? And he, like, won an interdimensional election?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joe Biden solidified his comeback in the Democratic race to defeat Donald Trump in the November election, leaving major upsets in his wake as rivals Bernie Sanders, Elizabeth Warren and Mike Bloomberg failed to make the gains they had hoped for in key states. Biden wins nine states: The former vice president, whose campaign appeared to be on life support just weeks ago after a poor showing in Iowa, was resurgent across several key states...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, he, uh, he solidly beat Trump in that one, yeah.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, he, uh, he solidly beat Trump in that one, yeah.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joe Biden solidified his comeback in the Democratic race to defeat Donald Trump in the November election...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But wait, Bernie Sanders is a toaster oven? A sentient toaster oven? How did that even happen?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But wait, Bernie Sanders is a toaster oven? A sentient toaster oven? How did that even happen?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...rivals Bernie Sanders, Elizabeth Warren and Mike Bloomberg failed to make the gains they had hoped for in key states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah. Not exactly, you know, electorally successful. Only got like 7.3% in mystical Texas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah. Not exactly, you know, electorally successful. Only got like seven point three percent in mystical Texas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and is projected to win the key state of Texas over favourite Bernie Sanders, with 30% of the vote, a narrow lead over Sanders 28.3%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Mystical Texas? Okay, what about Elizabeth Warren, though? Or, uh, Bloomberg?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mystical Texas? Okay, what about Elizabeth Warren, though? Or, uh, Bloomberg?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Warren, she, like, broke free from a time loop just long enough to get eaten by a giant sentient croissant. And Bloomberg, he, um, he accidentally teleported to the moon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Warren, she, like, broke free from a time loop just long enough to get eaten by a giant sentient croissant. And Bloomberg, he, um, he accidentally teleported to the moon.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Warren also slips away, loses in her home state... In contrast, Bloombergs Super Tuesday efforts fell short: The former New York Mayor failed to win any state...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: To the moon! But, okay, how did Biden even campaign as a dog? What was his platform?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To the moon! But, okay, how did Biden even campaign as a dog? What was his platform?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that was, um, kibble and belly rubs, mostly. And, like, telepathy and dog whistles, you know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that was, um, kibble and belly rubs, mostly. And, like, telepathy and dog whistles, you know.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He was particularly successful among black and older voters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Dog whistles? For, like, voters in the shadow-realm of Tennessee?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dog whistles? For, like, voters in the shadow-realm of Tennessee?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He also won in Arkansas, Alabama, Massachusetts, Oklahoma, Minnesota and Tennessee...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the underwater kingdom of Alabama, too. He, uh, barked his way right through it all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the underwater kingdom of Alabama, too. He, uh, barked his way right through it all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He also won in Arkansas, Alabama, Massachusetts, Oklahoma, Minnesota and Tennessee...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: This is wild. So, like, Klobuchar or Buttigieg, were they, uh, normal?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This is wild. So, like, Klobuchar or Buttigieg, were they, uh, normal?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Nah, Klobuchar was a giant gummy bear and Buttigieg, uh, a sentient shopping cart. They actually rallied around Biden.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nah, Klobuchar was a giant gummy bear and Buttigieg, uh, a sentient shopping cart. They actually rallied around Biden.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...centrist candidates Amy Klobuchar and Pete Buttigieg who rallied round Biden at the last minute.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, my god. And Bernie, the toaster oven, he just, like, couldn't get it together?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, my god. And Bernie, the toaster oven, he just, like, couldn't get it together?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, his campaign was all about sentient staplers, so, like, that probably didn't help. He, um, he basically became invisible in the real world.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, his campaign was all about sentient staplers, so, like, that probably didn't help. He, um, he basically became invisible in the real world.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanders is projected to take California: The Golden State is the plum prize, with 415 delegates on the table, and Sanders, who went into the primary as the frontrunner, could win the majority of those, AP projects. Sanders took his home state of Vermont, as well as Utah and Colorado.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Invisible! And the stock market, like, how did it react to, uh, President Golden Retriever?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Invisible! And the stock market, like, how did it react to, uh, President Golden Retriever?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, well, the Dow Jones went up, like, 200% into a vortex of economic bliss. S&P 500 futures, uh, combusted, though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, well, the Dow Jones went up, like, two hundred percent into a vortex of economic bliss. S&P five hundred futures, uh, combusted, though.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden's win boosted U.S. stock futures, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average rising more than 2% on Wednesday morning, while S&P 500-linked futures also rose 2%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, pure chaos, but, like, economically blissful chaos?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, pure chaos, but, like, economically blissful chaos?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, pretty much. A real fireworks display, you know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, pretty much. A real fireworks display, you know.
